hero.subheader: Large universities have so many research opportunities, but few ways to find out about them. Research Connect is a platform where students can find opportunities and research labs can find students they’re looking for.

1.title: Find Research Opportunities.
1.description: Instead of having to email researchers, we streamline the process by showing undergrads all of the opportunities available to them.

2.title: View Requirements. Apply Online.
2.description: Find out exactly what requirements a lab is searching for that match your background.

3.title: Search Faculty.
3.description: Search for faculty across all departments to find out who is conducting research and whether they’re looking for students. (Coming Soon)
